title: Cant Install League Of Legends Again
body:
Yesterday i uninstall league, and today i am trying to install it back, the problem is: "The specific account already exists" This shows me in the in the installation setup, i already search for any files of Riot Games, League of Legends and nothing, did even search in %appdata%, i even run CCleaner and didnt show up the game or any file. Why does it say i have the game in my computer... pls HELP!

> Here is the error: https://gyazo.com/40855c01119be1f3585a4f60af76318b ,its in portuguese but you guys get the idea.

replies.body: Your issue sounds pretty unusual, but we can help make sure you're starting on a clean state.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform an uninstall which will make sure anything missing previously gets cleaned.  You should be able to perform your install then!
